title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Surrender Forms, form SURR-5-a - Affidavit of provider of supportive counseling - extra-judicial surrender of child in foster care
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Surrender Forms, form SURR-5-a - Affidavit of provider of supportive counseling - extra-judicial surrender of child in foster care

State Regulations

Soc. Serv. Law ยง 383-c(4)(c) Form
SURR-5-a
(Extra-Judicial Surrender of Child in

Foster Care--
Affidavit of Provider of Supportive

Counseling)[FN1]
(9/2006)
FAMILY COURT OF THE STATE OF NEW
YORK
COUNTY OF
________
In the Matter of the Application for

Docket No. Approval of a Surrender Instrument
AFFIDAVIT OF PROVIDER OF
Concerning SUPPORTIVE COUNSELING--
EXTRA-JUDICIAL SURRENDER OF
CHILD IN FOSTER CARE
CIN#
Pursuant to Section 383-c of the

Social

Services Law
________
STATE OF NEW YORK)
) ss.: COUNTY OF)
I, [specify name of witness]:, having been
duly sworn, deposes and states the following: 1. I am employed by [specify; indicate if
self-employed]: 2. I was not the authorized agency
employee witness to the extra-judicial surrender of [specify child]: by
[specify person executing surrender]: 3. Upon information and belief, on
[specify date]: [specify person executing surrender]: was offered supportive
counseling regarding the extra-judicial surrender of [specify child]: and on
[specify date]: accepted did not accept the offer of
supportive counseling. 4. [Check applicable box or delete
inapplicable provision]: On [specify date]:, I provided supportive
counseling for [specify person executing surrender]: as follows [describe, including nature of counseling]: Supportive counseling was not provided to
the person executing the surrender. _______________
Signature of Provider of Supportive

Counseling

Sworn to before me this day of, ________
Notary Public
(Deputy) Clerk of Court
[FN1] The provider of supportive
counseling may not be the employee-witness to the extra-judicial surrender. See
18 NYCRR ยง421.6. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. IV, subch. A, Surrender Forms, form
SURR-5-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
